sources.title: Wild West Days (1937) 13-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGERüçïJOHNNY MACK BROWN
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 13-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Johnny Mack Brown, Lynn Gilbert, Chief Thunderbird
Directed by:  Ford Beebe & Clifford Smith
üçïNEW 4K RESTORATIONüçï
In this action-packed serial, Kentucky Wade and his two pals fight their way across the plains and mountains to rescue a couple who are being threatened by outlaws. 
 üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
0:27       CHAPTER 1: Death Rides the Range
21:39     CHAPTER 2: The Redskins Revenge
42:33     CHAPTER 3: The Brink of Doom
1:03:36  CHAPTER 4: The Indians Are Coming
1:24:39  CHAPTER 5: The Leap For Life
1:45:52  CHAPTER 6: Death Stalks the Plains
2:06:12  CHAPTER 7: Six Gun Law
2:27:32  CHAPTER 8: The Gold Stampede
2:48:15  CHAPTER 9: Walls of Fire
3:09:44  CHAPTER 10: The Circle of Doom
3:30:37  CHAPTER 11: The Thundering Herd
3:51:20  CHAPTER 12: Rustlers and Redskins
4:11:28  CHAPTER 13: The Rustler's Roundup
4:31:05 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Retired lawman Kentucky Wade and his three buddies, Mike Morales, "Dude" Hanford, and "Trigger" Benton come to Brimstone and help their friends Larry Munro and his sister, Lucy, in their fight to retain control of Larry's rich ore mine. "Doc" Hardy, an old friend of Wade's, joins them in their efforts to keep Matt Keeler, the scheming owner of "The Brimstone News", from his efforts to wrest control of Munro's property and mine. Keller employs a legion of henchmen and sidelines at running runs guns to Red Hatchet and his tribe, so they also can get in on the fray against the Munro, Kentucky, and friends.
metadata.Writer: W.R. Burnett, Wyndham Gittens, Norman S. Hall
metadata.Actors: Johnny Mack Brown, George Shelley, Lynn Gilbert
